prod_short_desc: Lock up Green Goblin in Spider-Man's amazing Spider Truck!
prod_long_desc:
Help Marvel’s Spider-Man stop Green Goblin from stealing the money! Use the tracking device and radar in Spider-Man’s amazing Spider Truck to find where he is hiding, then head to the scene to hunt him down. But be careful, as Green Goblin is planning to defend himself by throwing pumpkins! Team up with Spider-Man to capture him and lock him away in the secure jail cell inside the Spider Truck. Then drive him away and get ready for your next adventure. Includes 2 LEGO® DUPLO® figures: Spider-Manand Green Goblin. Combine with the 10607 Spider-Man Web-Bike Workshop for more Spider-Man road-based action.
Includes 2 LEGO DUPLO figures: Spider-Man and Green Goblin
Features a Spider-Man Spider Truck with opening windows, an onboard jail cell and an office with tracking screen element
Accessory elements include a turning radar dish, antenna and a chair
Also includes bricks decorated as pumpkins, money and a tracking map as story starters
Build and rebuild Spider-Man’s amazing Spider Truck!
Sit in the office to track Green Goblin!
Lock Green Goblin up and take him away!
Little Spider-Man fans will enjoy building and playing with this super fun vehicle
Ideal for developing early imagination and role-play skills
LEGO DUPLO products are specially designed to be fun and easy for little hands
Combine with the 10607 Spider-Man Web-Bike Workshop for more Spider-Man action on the road
Spider-Man’s Spider Truck measures over 7" high, 9" long and 2" wide
